casebody.data:
Jonathan BRUNSON
v.
NORTH CAROLINA INNOCENCE INQUIRY COMMISSION and the State of North Carolina No. 41P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Jonathan E. Brunson, for Brunson, Jonathan E. Barry H. Bloch, Assistant Attorney General, for North Carolina Innocence Inquiry Commission, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th of January 2019 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."
